EmailTemplate.name: OSS_Webinar_Spring Batch 3.0.0 7AM.Confirmation 1
EmailTemplate.subject: Webinar Confirmation: Spring Batch 3.0.0
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=There}}, Your registration is confirmed for the webinar Spring Batch 3.0.0 with Michael Minella, Pivotal. We are looking forward to having you join us. To help maximize your webinar experience we recommend that you join a test meeting before the session to check your system and browser compatibility at http://www.webex.com/test-meeting.html. Event Details:
Date: Tuesday, June 10, 2014 Europe: 3:00pm BST (London, UTC+1) Join the WebEx <https://gopivotal.webex.com/gopivotal/onstage/g.php?t=a&d=665542159> Dial In: US TOLL FREE+1-855-749-4750 US TOLL+1-415-655-0001 Show all global call-in numbers <https://gopivotal.webex.com/cmp0401l/webcomponents/widget/globalcallin/globalcallin.do?siteurl=gopivotal&serviceType=EC&eventID=111195292&tollFree=1> Show toll-free dialing restrictions
Access code: 665 542 159 Thank you,
